form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT, 44 1250 430

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 Form Approved Budget Bureau No. 43-R400.5 APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT FILE NO. A12 250 430 APPLICATION FOR THE BENEFITS OF SECTION: FEE STAMP 245 203(a)(7) and Sec. 245, I&N Act Accept fee: 249, I&N Act return to inv/f/lln Sec. 13, Act of 9/11/57 REC'D T/C DEC 5 1968 Immigrant Nonimmigrant Visa Issued at: on: (DO NOT WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE.) (SEE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE FILLING IN APPLICATION. IF YOU NEED MORE SPACE TO ANSWER FULLY ANY QUESTION ON THIS FORM, USE A SEPARATE SHEET AND IDENTIFY EACH ANSWER WITH THE NUMBER OF THE CORRESPONDING QUESTION. FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) 1. I hereby apply for the status of a lawful permanent resident alien on the following basis: (Check appropriate box) An immigrant visa is immediately available to me: A. other than as a refugee B. as a refugee under the proviso to Section 203(a)(7) of the Act. I have resided in the United States continuously since C. prior to June 30, 1948 prior to July 1, 1924. AXA "WONG CUCKON 2. My name is (First) (Middle) (Last) My alien registration number is BEN DONG WONG A12 250 430 3. I reside in the United States at: (Apt. No.) (No. and Street) (City) (State) (ZIP Code) 1416 3RD AVENUE Los ANGELES CALIF 90019 4. Date of Birth Place of Birth (City or Town) (County, Province, or State) (Country) I am now a citizen of (Country) 1/22/14 CANTON, CHINA CHINA 1 5. I last arrived in the United States at the port of (City and State) on (Month) (Day) (Year) SER Los ANGELES Honolulu, Hawait 8/31/19 by (Name of vessel or other means of travel) Honocula, as a (Visitor, student, U.S. citizen, stowaway, immigrant, etc.) BORLIDGE PAL ret. USC 6. I am single married divorced widowed a. I have been married 1 times, including my present marriage, if now married. (If you are now married give the following:) b. Number of times my spouse has been married c Name of spouse one FONG SUEY GIN d. My spouse resides with me apart from me at Address (Apt. No.) (Number and Street) (Town or City) (Province or State) (Country) 7. a. I have 3 children, Ã¡s follows: (complete all columns as to each child. If child lives with you, state "with me" in last column; otherwise give city and state or country of child's residence. Name Sex Place of Birth Date of Birth Now Living at DON LEUNG WONG M CANTON CHINA 12/6/34 WAKKME 2625 Wilshire FOIA (b)(6) b. The following members of my family are also applying for permanent resident status: FANG SAFY Gook MARKET DOAGOBING 8. I list below all organizations, societies, clubs, and associations, past or present, in which I have held membership in the United States or a foreign country, and the periods and places of such membership. (If you have never been a member of any organization, state "None.") Koonia BENEVOLENT WONG FAMOLY ASSOCIATION 2 9. I have have not been charged with a violation of law (other than minor traffic violations) (If you have ever been charged with a violation of law, give date and place and nature of each charge and the final result., NONE 10. I have have not requested exemption or discharge from training or service in the Armed Forces of the United States. (If you have ever requested exemption or discharge from training or service in the Armed Forces of the United States, give date and place of your, request, the reason for such request, and specify to whom it was made.)
